description: A container representing a single tab of a TabFolder widget.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object as widget properties.

title.description: The title to be displayed on the tab.

image.description: An image to be displayed on the tab.  Will not be shown on iOS if the `TabFolder`'s `tabBarLocation` is set to `top`

selectedImage.description: An image to be displayed on the currently active tab.

badge.description: A badge to attach to the tab.

appear.description: Fired when the tab will become visible, i.e. the selection of its TabFolder.

disappear.description: Fired when the tab is no longer visible, i.e. it no longer is the selection of its TabFolder.

links.title: Snippet with a TabFolder and Tabs
